name: Split Crown
description:
An Angel and a Demon fight for control over your decisions although there's a lot of obstacles for them in your mind. Get the Angel and the Demon to their respective crowns without a hassle and you can arrive at a conclusion, after all, it takes listening to both sides to make a decision. 

This game has you solve puzzles with the unique mechanic of controlling two characters at once: an Angel and a Demon with each moving the opposite direction of the other through water, holy water, and lava, if they can.

Assets made before jam: Simple scripts for tile collision, approaching a value, pausing, and getting player input.

This game was made in the 48 hour United Game Jam in June 2020 under the theme of "Two". Music and Sound Design done by Epiqai, Art, Programming, and Design done by RemyTheRat.
